name: Muhammadu Buhari
shortBio: Former President of Nigeria known for his anti-corruption stance and leadership in military governance.
longBio: Muhammadu Buhari served as Nigeria's president from 2015 to 2023, emphasizing anti-corruption and security, though facing criticism for economic policies and delays in reforms.
achievements: Led military governance from 1983 to 1985 before being elected in 2015.

name: Bola Tinubu
shortBio: Influential Nigerian politician and former Governor of Lagos, known as 'Jagaban' for his political influence.
longBio: Bola Tinubu served as the Governor of Lagos from 1999 to 2007. His political influence in Nigeria extends to strategic appointments and policies impacting the All Progressives Congress.
achievements: Transformed Lagos into a major economic hub during his governorship.
Prominent figure in the founding of the APC political party.

name: Atiku Abubakar
shortBio: Nigerian businessman and politician, former Vice President and prominent PDP member.
longBio: Atiku Abubakar served as Vice President of Nigeria from 1999 to 2007, known for his advocacy of privatization and economic reform. He remains a significant figure in Nigerian politics as a member of the PDP.
achievements: Championed economic reforms and privatization as Vice President.
Established the American University of Nigeria in Adamawa.
